scripts.clean: yarn run clean-app && yarn run clean-lib && yarn run clean-tests
scripts.install-all: yarn run install-lib && yarn run install-tests && yarn run install-app
scripts.install-app: cd app && yarn install && yarn link wgsg-lib
scripts.install-lib: cd lib && yarn install && yarn link
scripts.install-tests: cd tests && yarn install && yarn link wgsg-lib
scripts.reinstall-all: yarn run clean && yarn run install-all
